Chai

Who said that other countries were held accountable to rid other countries of dictators? I see two reasons to wage war on a country only: (a) self defense, and (b): to stop genocide. Iran is repressive, but I don't think that they are actively at this time killing people based solely on race/religion/ethnicity. If they are, I stand corrected. Remember Vietnam? We were saving the people from the "evil communist regime." I am neither a communist, nor a conciencious objector, but I saw no point in wasting lives in another person's fight. Neither do I see a point in killing our own soldiers over Iran.
